name: URigVMController
doc:
The Controller is the sole authority to perform changes
on the Graph. The Controller itself is stateless.
The Controller offers a Modified event to subscribe to
for user interface views - so they can be informed about
any change that's happening within the Graph.
The Controller routes all changes through the Graph itself,
so you can have N Controllers performing edits on 1 Graph,
and N Views subscribing to 1 Controller.
In Python you can also subscribe to this event to be
able to react to topological changes of the Graph there.

methods.name: AddArrayNode
methods.doc:
Adds a Array Node to the edited Graph.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddArrayNodeFromObjectPath
methods.doc:
Adds a Array Node to the edited Graph given a struct object path name.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddArrayPin
methods.doc:
Adds an array element pin to the end of an array pin.
This causes a PinArraySizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: AddBranchNode
methods.doc:
Adds a branch node to the graph.
Branch nodes can be used to split the execution of into multiple branches,
allowing to drive behavior by logic.

methods.name: AddCommentNode
methods.doc:
Adds a Comment Node to the edited Graph.
Comments can be used to annotate the Graph.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddDecorator
methods.doc: Adds a decorator to a node

methods.name: AddEnumNode
methods.doc:
Adds an enum node to the graph
Enum nodes can be used to represent constant enum values within the graph

methods.name: AddExposedPin
methods.doc: Adds an exposed pin to the graph controlled by this

methods.name: AddFreeRerouteNode
methods.doc: Adds a free Reroute Node

methods.name: AddFunctionReferenceNodeFromDescription
methods.doc: Adds a function reference / invocation to the graph

methods.name: AddFunctionToLibrary
methods.doc: Adds a function definition to a function library graph

methods.name: AddIfNode
methods.doc:
Adds an if node to the graph.
If nodes can be used to pick between two values based on a condition.

methods.name: AddInjectedNode
methods.doc:
Adds a Function / Struct Node to the edited Graph as an injected node
UnitNode represent a RIGVM_METHOD declaration on a USTRUCT.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddInjectedNodeFromStructPath
methods.doc:
Adds a Function / Struct Node to the edited Graph as an injected node
UnitNode represent a RIGVM_METHOD declaration on a USTRUCT.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddInvokeEntryNode
methods.doc:
Adds an entry invocation node
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddLink
methods.doc:
Adds a link to the graph.
This causes a LinkAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddLocalVariable
methods.doc: Add a local variable to the graph

methods.name: AddLocalVariableFromObjectPath
methods.doc: Add a local variable to the graph given a struct object path name.

methods.name: AddRerouteNodeOnLink
methods.doc:
Adds a Reroute Node on an existing Link to the edited Graph.
Reroute Nodes can be used to visually improve the data flow,
they don't require any additional memory though and are purely
cosmetic. This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddRerouteNodeOnLinkPath
methods.doc:
Adds a Reroute Node on an existing Link to the edited Graph given the Link's string representation.
Reroute Nodes can be used to visually improve the data flow,
they don't require any additional memory though and are purely
cosmetic. This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddRerouteNodeOnPin
methods.doc:
Adds a Reroute Node on an existing Pin to the editor Graph.
Reroute Nodes can be used to visually improve the data flow,
they don't require any additional memory though and are purely
cosmetic. This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddSelectNode
methods.doc:
Adds a select node to the graph.
Select nodes can be used to pick between multiple values based on an index.

methods.name: AddTemplateNode
methods.doc: Adds a template node to the graph.

methods.name: AddUnitNode
methods.doc:
Adds a Function / Struct Node to the edited Graph.
UnitNode represent a RIGVM_METHOD declaration on a USTRUCT.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddUnitNodeFromStructPath
methods.doc:
Adds a Function / Struct Node to the edited Graph given its struct object path name.
UnitNode represent a RIGVM_METHOD declaration on a USTRUCT.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddUnitNodeWithDefaults
methods.doc:
Adds a Function / Struct Node to the edited Graph.
UnitNode represent a RIGVM_METHOD declaration on a USTRUCT.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddVariableNode
methods.doc:
Adds a Variable Node to the edited Graph.
Variables represent local work state for the function and
can be read from and written to.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: AddVariableNodeFromObjectPath
methods.doc:
Adds a Variable Node to the edited Graph given a struct object path name.
Variables represent local work state for the function and
can be read from (bIsGetter == true) or written to (bIsGetter == false).
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: BindPinToVariable
methods.doc:
Binds a pin to a variable (or removes the binding given NAME_None)
This causes a PinBoundVariableChanged modified event.

methods.name: BreakAllLinks
methods.doc:
Removes all links on a given pin from the graph.
This might cause multiple LinkRemoved modified event.

methods.name: BreakLink
methods.doc:
Removes a link from the graph.
This causes a LinkRemoved modified event.

methods.name: CancelUndoBracket
methods.doc:
Cancels an undo bracket / scoped transaction.
This is primarily useful for Python.
This causes a UndoBracketCanceled modified event.

methods.name: CanImportNodesFromText
methods.doc: Exports the given nodes as text

methods.name: ChangeExposedPinType
methods.doc: Changes the type of an exposed pin in the graph controlled by this

methods.name: ClearArrayPin
methods.doc:
Removes all (but one) array element pin from an array pin.
This causes a PinArraySizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: ClearNodeSelection
methods.doc:
Deselects all currently selected nodes in the graph.
This might cause several NodeDeselected modified event.

methods.name: CloseUndoBracket
methods.doc:
Closes an undo bracket / scoped transaction.
This is primarily useful for Python.
This causes a UndoBracketClosed modified event.

methods.name: CollapseNodes
methods.doc: Turns a series of nodes into a Collapse node

methods.name: DuplicateArrayPin
methods.doc:
Duplicates an array element pin.
This causes a PinArraySizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: EjectNodeFromPin
methods.doc: Ejects the last injected node on a pin

methods.name: EnableReporting
methods.doc: Enables or disables the error reporting of this Controller.

methods.name: ExpandLibraryNode
methods.doc: Turns a library node into its contained nodes

methods.name: ExportNodesToText
methods.doc: Exports the given nodes as text

methods.name: ExportSelectedNodesToText
methods.doc: Exports the selected nodes as text

methods.name: GetControllerForGraph
methods.doc: Returns another controller for a given graph

methods.name: GetGraph
methods.doc: Returns the currently edited Graph of this controller.

methods.name: GetPinDefaultValue
methods.doc: Returns the default value of a pin given its pinpath.

methods.name: GetSchema
methods.doc: Returns the schema used by this controller

methods.name: GetTopLevelGraph
methods.doc: Returns the top level graph

methods.name: ImportNodesFromText
methods.doc: Exports the given nodes as text

methods.name: InsertArrayPin
methods.doc:
Inserts an array element pin into an array pin.
This causes a PinArraySizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: IsFunctionPublic
methods.doc: Returns true if a function is marked as public in the function library

methods.name: IsReportingEnabled
methods.doc: Returns true if reporting is enabled

methods.name: IsTransacting
methods.doc: Returns true if the controller is currently transacting

methods.name: LocalizeFunctionFromPath
methods.doc: Copies a function declaration into this graph's local function library

methods.name: LocalizeFunctions
methods.doc: Copies a series of function declaratioms into this graph's local function library

methods.name: MakeBindingsFromVariableNode
methods.doc: Turns a variable node into one or more bindings

methods.name: MakeOptionsForWorkflow
methods.doc: creates the options struct for a given workflow

methods.name: MakeVariableNodeFromBinding
methods.doc: Turns a binding to a variable node

methods.name: MarkFunctionAsPublic
methods.doc: Mark a function as public/private in the function library

methods.name: OpenUndoBracket
methods.doc:
Opens an undo bracket / scoped transaction for
a series of actions to be performed as one step on the
Undo stack. This is primarily useful for Python.
This causes a UndoBracketOpened modified event.

methods.name: PerformUserWorkflow
methods.doc: performs all actions representing the workflow

methods.name: PromoteCollapseNodeToFunctionReferenceNode
methods.doc: Turns a collapse node into a function node

methods.name: PromoteFunctionReferenceNodeToCollapseNode
methods.doc: Turns a collapse node into a function node

methods.name: PromotePinToVariable
methods.doc: Promotes a pin to a variable

methods.name: Redo
methods.doc:
Re-does the last action on the stack.
Note: This should really only be used for unit tests,
use the GEditor's main Undo method instead.

methods.name: RefreshVariableNode
methods.doc: Refreshes the variable node with the new data

methods.name: RemoveArrayPin
methods.doc:
Removes an array element pin from an array pin.
This causes a PinArraySizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: RemoveDecorator
methods.doc: Removes a decorator from a node

methods.name: RemoveExposedPin
methods.doc: Removes an exposed pin from the graph controlled by this

methods.name: RemoveFunctionFromLibrary
methods.doc: Removes a function from a function library graph

methods.name: RemoveInjectedNode
methods.doc:
Removes an injected node
This causes a NodeRemoved modified event.

methods.name: RemoveLocalVariable
methods.doc: Remove a local variable from the graph

methods.name: RemoveNode
methods.doc:
Removes a node from the graph
This causes a NodeRemoved modified event.

methods.name: RemoveNodeByName
methods.doc:
Removes a node from the graph given the node's name.
This causes a NodeRemoved modified event.

methods.name: RemoveNodes
methods.doc:
Removes a list of nodes from the graph
This causes a NodeRemoved modified event.

methods.name: RemoveNodesByName
methods.doc:
Removes a list of nodes from the graph given the names
This causes a NodeRemoved modified event.

methods.name: RenameExposedPin
methods.doc: Renames an exposed pin in the graph controlled by this

methods.name: RenameFunction
methods.doc: Renames a function in the function library

methods.name: RenameLocalVariable
methods.doc: Rename a local variable from the graph

methods.name: RenameNode
methods.doc:
Renames a node in the graph
This causes a NodeRenamed modified event.

methods.name: ReplaceParameterNodeWithVariable
methods.doc: Refreshes the variable node with the new data

methods.name: ResetPinDefaultValue
methods.doc:
Resets the default value of a pin given its pinpath.
This causes a PinDefaultValueChanged modified event.

methods.name: ResolveWildCardPin
methods.doc: Resolves a wildcard pin on any node

methods.name: SelectNode
methods.doc:
Selects a single node in the graph.
This causes a NodeSelected / NodeDeselected modified event.

methods.name: SelectNodeByName
methods.doc:
Selects a single node in the graph by name.
This causes a NodeSelected / NodeDeselected modified event.

methods.name: SetArrayPinSize
methods.doc:
Sets the size of the array pin
This causes a PinArraySizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetCommentText
methods.doc:
Sets the comment text and properties of a comment node in the graph.
This causes a CommentTextChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetCommentTextByName
methods.doc:
Sets the comment text and properties of a comment node in the graph by name.
This causes a CommentTextChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetExposedPinIndex
methods.doc: Sets the index for an exposed pin. This can be used to move the pin up and down on the node.

methods.name: SetIsRunningUnitTest
methods.doc: Helper function to disable a series of checks that can be ignored during a unit test

methods.name: SetLocalVariableType
methods.doc: Sets the type of the local variable

methods.name: SetNodeCategory
methods.doc:
Sets the category of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeCategoryChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeCategoryByName
methods.doc:
Sets the category of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeCategoryChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeColor
methods.doc:
Sets the color of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeColorChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeColorByName
methods.doc:
Sets the color of a node in the graph by name.
This causes a NodeColorChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeDescription
methods.doc:
Sets the function description of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeDescriptionChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeDescriptionByName
methods.doc:
Sets the keywords of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeDescriptionChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeKeywords
methods.doc:
Sets the keywords of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeKeywordsChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeKeywordsByName
methods.doc:
Sets the keywords of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeKeywordsChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodePosition
methods.doc:
Sets the position of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodePositionChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodePositionByName
methods.doc:
Sets the position of a node in the graph by name.
This causes a NodePositionChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeSelection
methods.doc:
Selects the nodes given the selection
This might cause several NodeDeselected modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeSize
methods.doc:
Sets the size of a node in the graph.
This causes a NodeSizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetNodeSizeByName
methods.doc:
Sets the size of a node in the graph by name.
This causes a NodeSizeChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetPinDefaultValue
methods.doc:
Sets the default value of a pin given its pinpath.
This causes a PinDefaultValueChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetPinExpansion
methods.doc:
Sets the pin to be expanded or not
This causes a PinExpansionChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetPinIsWatched
methods.doc:
Sets the pin to be watched (or not)
This causes a PinWatchedChanged modified event.

methods.name: SetRemappedVariable
methods.doc: Sets the remapped variable on a function reference node

methods.name: SetSchema
methods.doc: Sets the schema on the controller

methods.name: SetUnitNodeDefaults
methods.doc:
Adds a Function / Struct Node to the edited Graph.
UnitNode represent a RIGVM_METHOD declaration on a USTRUCT.
This causes a NodeAdded modified event.

methods.name: UnbindPinFromVariable
methods.doc:
Removes the binging of a pin to a variable
This causes a PinBoundVariableChanged modified event.

methods.name: Undo
methods.doc:
Un-does the last action on the stack.
Note: This should really only be used for unit tests,
use the GEditor's main Undo method instead.

methods.name: UnresolveTemplateNodes
methods.doc: Turns a resolved templated node(s) back into its template.

methods.name: UpgradeNodes
methods.doc: Upgrades a set of nodes with each corresponding next known version
